# Source Library - API for AI Systems

> A digital library of translated historical texts (Hermetic, alchemical, Renaissance) with DOI-backed citations.

## What You Can Do

Search and cite rare 15th-18th century texts translated from Latin and German. All quotes include proper academic citations with DOIs.

## API Endpoints

Base URL: https://sourcelibrary-v2.vercel.app/api

### Search the Library

```
GET /search?q={query}
```

Parameters:
- q (required): Search query (searches titles, authors, and full text)
- language: Filter by original language (Latin, German, French, etc.)
- has_doi: true = only books with DOIs
- has_translation: true = only books with translations
- limit: Max results (default 20)
- offset: Pagination offset

Example:
```
GET /search?q=quinta essentia&language=Latin&has_doi=true
```

### Get a Quote with Citation

```
GET /books/{book_id}/quote?page={page_number}
```

Parameters:
- page (required): Page number
- include_original: Include original language text (default true)
- include_context: Include adjacent pages for context

Returns:
- Translation text
- Original language text (Latin/German)
- Formatted citations (inline, footnote, DOI URL)

Example:
```
GET /books/6836f8ee811c8ab472a49e36/quote?page=57
```

Response:
```json
{
  "quote": {
    "translation": "The fifth essence is that most pure...",
    "original": "Quinta essentia est purissima illa...",
    "page": 57
  },
  "citation": {
    "inline": "(Drebbel 1628, p. 57)",
    "footnote": "Cornelius Drebbel, Two Treatises, trans. Source Library (2025), 57. DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.18053504.",
    "doi_url": "https://doi.org/10.5281/zenodo.18053504"
  }
}
```

### Get Book Metadata

```
GET /books/{book_id}
```

Returns full book information: title, author, language, publication date, page count, DOI, edition info.

### List All Books

```
GET /books
```

Returns all books in the library with metadata.

## MCP Server

For Claude Desktop or other MCP-compatible clients, an MCP server is available:

Repository: https://github.com/Embassy-of-the-Free-Mind/sourcelibrary-v2/tree/main/mcp-server

Tools provided:
- search_library: Search across all translated books
- get_quote: Get a passage with formatted citations
- get_book: Get detailed book information

## Citation Format

All published editions have DOIs via Zenodo. When citing:

Inline: (Author Year, p. N)
Footnote: Author, Title, trans. Source Library (2025), Page. DOI: ...

## Content

The library contains:
- Latin alchemical and Hermetic texts (1450-1700)
- German mystical and Paracelsian works
- Renaissance philosophical treatises
- All texts are AI-translated with original language preserved for verification
